| blank_info_sec1 = 0.693 · 1st of 10 | website = | name = }} Bulawayo is the second largest city in Zimbabwe. It is the largest city in the country's Matabeleland region. The city's population, based on the 2022 census, is listed as 665,940.Citypopulation.de Population of the major cities in Zimbabwe ==References== Category:Cities in Zimbabwe
title: Bulawayo
